info.title: OpenAPI Plant Store
info.description: A sample API that uses a plant store as an example to demonstrate features in the OpenAPI specification

get.description: Retrieve a list of banks for a given country using the ISO country code.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: The ISO country code for which to retrieve bank details.

200.description: A list of banks in the specified country.

404.description: No banks found for the specified country.

denomination.description: Returns **RANGE** for variable package amounts or **FIXED** for denominated packages

receiving_country.description: ISO-3 country code of the receiver's country

amount_charged.description: The Amount to be used in step 2 for **RANGE** denomination and **FIXED** denomination

allowed_packages.description: Returns an array of acceptable packageAmounts for the specified mno in the receiving country for **FIXED** denomination. Returns null for **RANGE** denomination.

currency.description: ISO-3 currency code of receiver's country

message.description: Indicates whether the validation was successful. A response of validation_successful means you can continue to the next step, while validation_unsuccessful means the process should be halted.

get.description: Retrieves a list of available billers for services such as airtime, data bundles, electricity, and water across supported countries.

200.description: A list of billers successfully retrieved.

parameters.description: The unique identifier for the biller
